meaning: the difference in direction between two lines or surfaces, measured in degrees
the distance around the edge of a circle, place, or round object
the length of a straight line that can be drawn across a round object, passing through the middle of it
the size or length of a person or thing from the bottom to the top
the amount that something measures from one end to the other along the longest side
the distance from a particular point in any direction, or a straight line from the center to the edge of a circle
the amount of something that there is
the distance something measures from one side or edge to the other
to get used to a new situation by changing your behavior or your ideas
to cause information or feelings to be known or understood by someone
to make a new product available to the public
to make a feeling, situation, or process stronger or more intense
to obtain something that you want or need, often after a lot of effort
to delay something or stop it from happening for a while or until a decision is made about it
